availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Oliver C. Womack (Hopkins County + Webster County farmer )

body.p: Hopkins County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. North Carolina native. Married to Martha Womack. Father of Mary E. Womack, Lewis Womack, David Womack, Easter Womack, Squire Womack, Louisa Womack, Rachel Womack, and Walton B. Womack. Married to Jane Wilson Womack in Webster County, Kentucky, in September 1861. Farmer in Hopkins County in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hopkins County, District 2, p. 123B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 540.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Webster County Marriages, Film #000568132, p. 120-21.
